txt.en: Continue your study of ancient signs and the power they represent.
Strike with Sign of Battle: Wizard's Fire

'I believe that the path to knowledge is a road with no end. I suppose, therefore, that I will probably never get there. That is why I take frequent stops to read, have a bite to eat, lend a hand here or there, that sort of thing. Just because I take my time about it does not mean I have not gotten anywhere. There are secret things that I could show you, but...well, you would probably not enjoy the lesson.' -- Gregori, Wanderer from the Forest
